Question: Orthonose CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Orthonose

CES 2024

- Orthonose is showcasing their latest 2024 model at CES, featuring advanced noise-canceling technology
- The CES 2024 comes with a lightweight and ergonomic design for maximum comfort during extended use
- Equipped with long-lasting battery life, offering up to 30 hours of continuous playback on a single charge
- The headphones utilize Bluetooth 5.0 for seamless connectivity and also support hands-free calling with built-in microphone
- The CES 2024 boasts high-fidelity sound with deep bass and clear highs, providing an immersive audio experience
